title: Brooke Burke flaunts toned figure in crop top and jeans on date with realtor beau in West Hollywood
text:
She split from former Baywatch star David Charvet in April 2018 after 12 years together, seven of them as a married couple.

And over the summer, Brooke Burke, 48, has been teasing a new romance with realtor Scott Rigsby.

On Wednesday night, the TV personality and DWTS champ fueled the fire by stepping out for dinner with Rigsby at celebrity hotspot Craig's in West Hollywood.

Dinner date: Brooke Burke, 48, was spotted leaving celeb-friendly Craig's in West Hollywood on Wednesday night with realtor Scott rigsby

The brunette beauty showed off her toned figure in a white crop top and high-waist indigo jeans.

The ensemble revealed her rock hard abs and end of summer tan.

She added brown leather sandals and carried a brown leather purse over one shoulder.

She wore her long hair loose and accessorized with several gold necklaces.

Night out: The TV personalityt has been linked romantically with Rigsby, a founding partner at the Santa Monica-based real estate service firm Industry Partners, since August

Looking good: The brunette beauty showed off her toned figure in a white crop top and high-waist indigo jeans. The ensemble revealed her rock hard abs and end of summer tan

Stylish: She wore her long hair loose and accessorized with several gold necklaces and carried a brown leather purse over one shoulder

Rigsby is a founding partner at the Santa Monica-based real estate service firm Industry Partners, and according to his bio on the site, has closed $2.5 billion dollars worth of deals for clients such as Disney, Dreamworks and 20th Century Fox.

For his dinner date with Burke, he chose a navy shirt unbuttoned at the collar which he wore untucked over gray jeans.

The pair have been linked romantically since August and Rigsby was included in a fun pool snap Burke posted to her Instagram during a getaway in Laguna Beach.

Burke shares two children with Charvet - daughter Heaven, 12, and son Shaya, 11.

She also has two children with her first husband, Beverly Hills plastic surgeon Garth Fisher - daughters Neriah, 19, and Sierra Sky, 17.
description: The brunette beauty, 48, who split from David Charvet in April 2018,  wore her long hair loose and accessorized with several gold necklaces.
